showChatOnCombatTrackerTab.name: Show chat on combat tracker tab
showChatOnCombatTrackerTab.hint: Displays the chat log below the combat tracker

showChatInputInSplitView.name: Show chat input on combat tracker tab
showChatInputInSplitView.hint: Displays the chat input box below the chat log (as normal) on the combat tracker tab. Only takes effect when the above option is enabled.
